description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              JGC Vietnam is looking for Senior Construction Engineer for permanent position at company. The job holder will have chances to:
              

              1.	Carry out Construction Planning and Construction Cost Estimation Work at head office
              
              -	Execution formation together with Construction Manager/Project Manager
              
              -	PCWBS/ FWBS together with Schedule Controller
              
              -	Construction sequence of underground facilities and pavement
              
              -	Temporary facilities
              
              -	Manpower mobilization plan
              
              -	Construction equipment mobilization plan
              
              -	Progress plan
              
              -	Detail construction schedule per PCWBS
              
              -	Constructabilities study and plan, coordinate with Project Engineers and other related Departments
              
              -	Scaffolding plan
              
              -	Reflect the constructabilities plan in the inquiry for subcontracting
              
              -	Preparation of documents such as specifications, procedures, manuals and etc.
              
              -	Erection plan of extra heavy equipment
              
              -	Safety work control plan including rules and promotion plan together with safety engineer
              
              -	Plan of vender specialists
              
              -	Preparation of inquiry document and subcontracting document together with subcontract engineer.
              

              2.	Prepare instruction material together with direct supervisor and conduct orientation to junior staffs.
              

              3.	Prepare JVC Standard document and summarize construction historical data as required.
              

              4.	Supervise construction work at site as construction supervisor as requested by Senior Mgr of Construction Dept.
              

              *  Report to
              

              In principle, reporting to Department Manager, Project Manager in Head Office.
              
              In case of assignment to project site, reporting to Project Manager, Site Manager and Construction Manager
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Bachelor degrees, background in Civil, Mechanical or Piping
              
              -	Working as Construction Supervisor/Superintendent more than 10 years
              
              -	Having capability and experience of subcontracting is advantage
              
              -	Utilize WORD/EXCEL/POWER POINT for data summarization and presentation.
              
              -	Fluency in English speaking, writing and reading
              
              ---------------
              
              Benefit when working with us:
              
              •	Competitive salary package
              
              •	Yearly salary review
              
              •	Professional and active working environment https://youtu.be/I_DlnZaGJc4
              
              •	Chances to work in big projects and work overseas
              
              •	Annual health check
              
              •	Participation in company activities: Company tour, New year party, Football champion ship etc.,
              
              •	Training activities: E-learnings, soft skill training, English training etc.,
              
              •	Accident insurance 24/24
              
              •	Trade Union gift on special days such as B-day, Tet holiday, 1/6
              
              •	For more information, please visit our website at https://jgcvietnamjobs.com/
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
